title: Advantech iView exportDeviceList filename Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Advantech iView. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the NetworkServlet endpoint, which listens on TCP port 8080 by default. When parsing the filename element of the exportDeviceList action, the process does not properly validate a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute  code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Advantech has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ics/advisories/icsa-22-179-03
timeline:
2022-03-09 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-06-30 - Coordinated public release of advisory
